text: Everything bad. So bad. A restaurant that doesn't offer milk? Microwaved meals. Slow service. Drinks watered down. It's in the Bermuda Triangle of awful restaurants. And expensive.

We ate here a few weeks ago and it was very good. Chips and salsa to start. Margaritas were tasty. Enchiladas and burritos were great.  They had been open about a week or so when we stopped. Could tell they were working out kinks, but we had good service and food. Everything was fresh   We will be back.
Went here for lunch. As a whole everything was pretty good. We felt the price was a little on the high side but the good service and food made it easier to swallow.
